mapper.select:
select * from (select t1.sysguid, t1.buycertnos, t1.projectno, t1.bldno, t1.cellno, t1.floorname, t1.roomno, t1.buynames, t1.address from arc_houseinfo t1 minus select t2.sysguid, t2.buycertnos, t2.projectno, t2.bldno, t2.cellno, t2.floorname, t2.roomno, t2.buynames, t2.address from mid_aks.copy_houseinfo t2 )
where rownum <= #{houseMaxNum}
